info.name: WuzAPI Complete Collection
info.description: REST API for interacting with WhatsApp using the whatsmeow library.

request.description: Configure HMAC key for webhook signing

item.name: Send Text Message with link preview

request.description: Send text message as a reply with quoted text preview
Get chat history (use chat_jid=index for list)
Request a copy of a message that couldn't be decrypted
Delete a message from a chat.
Create a new WhatsApp group with specified name and participants
Configure group as locked (only admins can alter info) or unlocked
Remove the current photo from a WhatsApp group
Set group to announcement-only (admins only can send messages)
Join a group using an invite code
Get info about a group invite code
Add, remove, promote or demote participants from a group. Action can be 'add', 'remove', 'promote','demote'.
